paper_abstract: A macro-element of smoothness C-2 is constructed on the split of an octahedron into eight tetrahedra. This new element complements those recently constructed on the Clough-Tocher and Worsey-Farin splits of a tetrahedron (cf. Alfeld, P., Schumaker, L.L., 2005a, 2005b). The octahedral element uses supersplines of degree thirteen, and provides optimal order of approximation of smooth functions. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
